artwork.title: Starry Night
artwork.description: A depiction of a swirling night sky filled with stars and expressive brushwork that conveys intense emotion.

artwork.title: Sunflowers
artwork.description: A vibrant series of paintings that captures the beauty of sunflowers in bold colors and textures.

artwork.title: The Bedroom
artwork.description: A calm and intimate portrayal of Van Gogh's bedroom in Arles, France, showcasing his unique style.

artwork.title: The Persistence of Memory
artwork.description: A surreal masterpiece featuring melting clocks that challenge perceptions of time and reality.

artwork.title: Swans Reflecting Elephants
artwork.description: A painting that uses reflections to create surreal imagery, showcasing Dalí's creativity and precision.

artwork.title: The Scream
artwork.description: A powerful representation of human anxiety and despair, using bold colors and flowing lines.

artwork.title: Water Lilies
artwork.description: A stunning series of paintings capturing Monet's garden pond and the interplay of light and reflection.

artwork.title: The Two Fridas
artwork.description: A double self-portrait symbolizing Frida Kahlo's exploration of her identity and personal struggles.

artwork.title: Self-Portrait with Thorn Necklace and Hummingbird
artwork.description: A symbolic and emotive self-portrait reflecting Kahlo's pain and resilience.
